name: 4mobile
tagline: We make apps! 17+ yrs of experience
description:
European mobile app developer with 17+ yrs of experience in building top notch apps and cloud servers.
Fast facts:
Team together since 1998.
Coding mobile apps since 2002.
Platforms: iOS, Android, WinPhone, SmartTVs, SmartWatches, web, desktop.
Plus databases, big data, cloud, streaming.
Dev offices in the Czech Republic (Prague, Liberec).
Customers from all over the world. Near-shoring.
Our own multi-platform kit for effective development.
Fair rates.
We deliver. Fullstop.
We make apps, not crap!
